description: Eugene "Flash" Thomas, long-time fan of Spider-Man and friend of Peter Parker, thought his career was over when he lost his legs fighting in the Iraq War. Desperate for another opportunity to help others. Flash enrolled in Project Rebirth and soon found himself bound to the alien Symbiote Venom. Now possessing many of the same powers as his wall-crawling hero, Flash works for the US govemment as the deadly Agent Venom.

signature.name: Klyntar Rage
signature.description: At the beginning of the fight, and whenever Flash loses 50% of his Max Health, he temporarily loses control of the Venom symbiote, increasing Attack and Critical Damage by 35%.
signature.note: This effect is lost once he is struck 6 times.

gameplay.description: Flash's intense military background, coupled with the alien symbiotic enhancement, grants him a 73% chance to shrug off any Debuff.
gameplay.note: The Venom Symbiote works with Flash's training to reduce enemy Evasion chance by 28%.
